about_the_game:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work .

This game is a text-based visual novel.

Since I am in the process of optimizing and upgrading the overall graphics, please do not buy it for the time being. It is expected that a new version with improved graphics and dubbing will be updated at the end of the year. Since it is a personal independent game that is slow to develop, if you are interested, please consider adding it to the wish list to support it.（2024.8.23）

The names of the people in the game and the script are all made up and have no relationship with the real people of the same name.

Game Introduction

This game you will be as an ordinary graduate from the university campus, how will you choose the direction of your life development?
Become a social animal to work hard, or for her dream to do all the work, or simply take advantage of all the opportunities to become a business tycoon? Or will you be a loser, poor, but the eyes of the common white, feel the good and evil of human nature.
What awaits you is an unexpected encounter with the heroine, or the trap she prepared for you?
All can be made by their own choice ...

Game Features

Individual independent game production, the subject matter is special, experience a different realistic life

live2d animated characters, 1080p level definition

The game story has a small part of the story setting is from the personal experience of the studio members of the past, the project production intention is to do some difference with the vast galgame, the feeling will be biased towards social reality.

It is expected that there will be 5 heroine lines and 1 hidden heroine line. 1.0 will open the story lines of 3 heroines, and the other 3 heroine lines will be updated at a later stage by way of free DLC.

Studio Profile

RicoStudio is in October 2019, by a game art back home to start a business and established, the current game is the first production completed works, because in the program is not a strong first works selected visual novel, conditions are mature will start to carry out RPG and other types of games personal development, hope to be more support!

2022.1.9
Update the page information, from now on I will personally continue to update the game information.

Recently solved some problems.
1. the handheld version has been successfully packaged, and a set of production specifications for the handheld version has been established.
2. internal localization language and text switching has been solved.
3. half of the production process and scripts for female line 4 and female line 5 have been completed and are expected to be finished by the end of the year, and drawing production will begin after the year.
4. Due to limited funds, we will use machine translation for the localized languages.

The story of female line 4 is related to the story of female line 5, so it will be updated to version 1.2 when the production is finished.

Some other work is also in progress.
1, the handheld version will be considered on the shelves of Google and AppStore, basically free, but the content will be limited, there will be no DLC content, will not produce you-know-what content, will join the advertising SDK, incomplete, only as a little means of revenue and promotion.
2, the next work of my studio, will find a way to add similar to "heartbeat memories" and "star wishes" type of simulation management game, but it is estimated that it will not be too early to produce a successful, the current game can still support;【Business simulation will go live in Graduate Simulator 2.0】
3, dynamic CG will also consider the production, but no manpower, will take more time, I hope to maintain patience.

In addition, I'm sorry for the action, because the previous content was produced by many people, resulting in some obvious different levels of presentation on the screen, the later game production will be strictly controlled by me personally, as far as possible to make the screen level of the same level of presentation.

For more information, please visit the studio page
